name: Minimal Experience
description:
This prototype was made as a part of the Game Design Masters program at KADK.

The task was to create a non-game, and I created this in an hour. 

You float in 3D space, controlled as with any FPS.  Click the mouse to create an orb, click and hold to add more speed to the shot.

If you have a numpad, I recommend playing around with it - it affects gravity on the objects.
